Note for future reference:

Pooled Treatment Effect = $\sum_b \dfrac{n_b}{N}*\dfrac{Var(T_{i,b})}{Var(T_i)}*\hat{\Delta}_b$.

Let $\sum_b n_b = N$. Assume $\hat{\Delta}_b = c, \forall b$

$$
\sum_b \dfrac{n_b}{N}*\dfrac{Var(T_{i,b})}{Var(T_i)}*\hat{\Delta}_b = c*\sum_b \dfrac{n_b}{N}*\dfrac{Var(T_{i,b})}{Var(T_i)} \\
= c*\sum_b \dfrac{n_b}{N}*\dfrac{n_b*p_b*(1-p_b)}{N*p*(1-p)}
$$
Assume $p = 0.5$ and $p_b = 0.5, \forall b$

$$
c*\sum_b \dfrac{n_b}{N}*\dfrac{n_b*p_b*(1-p_b)}{N*p*(1-p)} = c*\sum_b \dfrac{n_b^2}{N^2} \\
$$
